data.title: Salome
data.meta_description: LP35451 U.S. Copyright Office Copyright: Raymond Rohauer; 1Jan67; LP35451. Photography, Charles Van Enger ; assistant cameraman, Paul Ivano ; costumes and sets, Natacha Rambova. Alla Nazimova, Mitchell Lewis, Nigel De Brulier, Arthur Jasmina, Earl Schenck, Rosa Dione, Frederick Peters, Luis Dumar. A shortened version of the six reel feature distributed by United Artists in 1922 and 1923 (LP18586 and LP18655). Based on the work by Oscar Wilde and the designs by Aubrey Beardsley. The credits on this version contain the following note:  translation by Vyvyan Holland by permission of the Folio Society, London. Sources used: American Film Institute catalog, feature films, 1921-1930, F2.4781; Catalog of copyright entries, motion pictures, 1960-1969, p. 477; Morris, Madam Valentino, p. 83-93; Spears, The Civil War on the screen, p. 148-149. Received: 5/12/70; ref print; copyright deposit; Copyright Collection. Received: 2/2/82; dup neg; gift, ATM 133; AFI/Triangle Laboratories Estate Collection.
